TRM Hire Plugin allows you to add candidates to your Sense TRM directly from Job boards. Spend less time entering data, and free up more time for your hiring needs.

Open the candidate's page on the job board and click on this extension. Extension will directly show you the candidateâ€™s information and give an option to add to a requisition mentioned in TRM.

*You need a Sense TRM account to use this extension. Request access here: http://sensehq.com/
